docs.snippet: ONCE upon a time, in a far off land called Brooklyn, there lived a girl named Barbara, and to tell the truth, she was no great beauty. Not once did Prince Charming cart her off to the ball, or even to the corner candy store; and no one -- not even...
docs.lead_paragraph: ONCE upon a time, in a far off land called Brooklyn, there lived a girl named Barbara, and to tell the truth, she was no great beauty. Not once did Prince Charming cart her off to the ball, or even to the corner candy store; and no one -- not even her mom -- ever seemed to listen to her.
